title: God’s Covenant with David
summary: David desires to build a temple for God, but God tells him through Nathan the prophet that his son will build it. Instead, God promises to establish David’s throne forever, a key prophecy of the coming Messiah.

faq.question: What did God promise David?
faq.answer: That He would establish David’s throne and kingdom forever.

faq.question: How did David respond to God’s covenant?
faq.answer: With humility and praise, acknowledging God’s greatness.
